title: Java
subTitle: This is a subtitle
overviewContent: I have extensive experience with Java, enabling me to build robust, scalable, and efficient back-end systems. I apply object-oriented programming principles in multi-tiered architectures and integrating complex third-party APIs. Whether working on full-stack development projects or Product Lifecycle Management (PLM) systems, I have ensured high performance, troubleshooting issues and optimising codebases for long-term maintainability in enterprise-level applications.
